extendedInfo.description: In addition to Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint viewing, purchasing the Full Version Key unlocks the ability to:â¢Edit , View & Create Microsoft Word, Excel, & PowerPoint files & high fidelity viewing of your PDF filesâ¢NEW! Supports password protected Word & Excel 97-2008 filesâ¢NEW! Google Docs support! Download, view & edit your files from your Google Docs directly in Docs To Go.â¢NEW! Desktop Application for bi-directional synchronization with your deviceâs USB cable.  Seamlessly move files from device to computer (Available on Windows Only*) using our new, and FREE desktop appJoin the 750,000 others and get the #1 Selling Office Suite, Documents To Go Please Note: You must have installed the Free Main app AND the Full Version Key in order to unlock all your Full Version Key features! For further support, please visit our website at www.dataviz.comThe DataViz AdvantageDocs To Go, now in its 14th year, is developed by DataViz, Inc., a producer of quality software for Windows & Mac for over 29 years.  In addition to Android, Documents To Go is also currently available for iPhone, Blackberry and S60.More info on Full Version Featuresâ¦â¢Word To Go includes rich formatting features including bold, italics, underline, font color, alignment, bulleted and numbered lists, tables, bookmarks, comments, footnotes, endnotes, track-changes, word count, find & replace, etc.â¢Sheet To Go offers powerful data computation with support for 111 functions, cell, number and sheet formatting, row and column preferences, auto-fit options, freeze panes, sort, cut, copy, paste, undo, redo, charting, etc. â¢Slideshow To Go allows you to effortlessly âflickâ through slides, review notes, rehearse timing and make last minute modifications to presentations when on the go. â¢PDF To Go provides high-fidelity viewing of important reference materials with options for page view, word wrap, auto-rotate, bookmarks, search, select and copy text, and more... â¢Google Docs Support Download, view and edit your files from your Google Docs account directly in Docs To Go. Any changes you make can be saved and synchronized back to Google Docs so that you'll always have the most up-to-date version. You can even create new files in Docs To Go and upload them immediately to your account. â¢Desktop Synchronization:  Transfer your files from your Windows PC to your Android device over USB. Any edits made in either location will automatically sync and 100% of the original file formatting will be maintained via our Intact Technology.â¢Total access with support for attachments, password-protected files, built-in file browser, memory card support, and new Live Folder for recently used documents â¢Localized in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, Japanese, Turkish, Russian, Polish, Czech and Arabic and traditional and simplified Chinese Why choose Documents To Go?â¢Full featured   Documents To Go is not just a viewer, it's a complete solution with a full range of viewing AND editing features. Simply unlock premium features by purchasing the 'Full Version Key' from the Android Market.â¢First to market Documents To Go is the first mobile Office suite for Android that supports editing of native Microsoft Word, Excel & PowerPoint files! â¢Powered by InTact Technology. DataViz' acclaimed technology ensures all original file formatting is retained once a file has been edited on an Android device and then forwarded on.â¢Send & receive attachments. Documents To Go is tightly integrated with Gmail and other e-mail applications like RoadSync for quick and easy native attachment downloading and sending. â¢Native. Open Word and Excel files on your Android phone without any desktop or server conversion needed.

reviews.comment: This is a very useful app. Obviously, still in it\'s early stages. Wish list: view more than first page of spreadsheet; text to wrap in cells; print...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: An excellent portable office suite.
reviews.comment: Works great and the price is reasonable. Others I see this price and compare it to the smaller programs like the flash games and such. Your program was built for a more productive purpase. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great program, very useful I use it all the time. It would be nice if there was an easier way to close docs other than the menu. GREAT APP!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect choice....
reviews.comment: Loved this app on Palm... Love this app on Android. Using and syncing it with Google Docs automaticaly. No stress with download and upload... Very good invest even for private use. Worth every penny...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good...BUT.....
reviews.comment: The app would be very good if it allowed copy/paste of images. That is the #1 failure with the application. I own a couple different competing apps i paid for and although i like Docs To Go, i rarely use.in favor of OfficeSuite which allows user to cut and past rich text and images as well as import images from file. Many of us were lead to believenthe.program allowed images to be worked with. It doesnt. Just be aware. If you need word with.ilages use another app. Beside the image.failure, it very good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Installed fine for me. Make sure you have main (free) app installed first. Payment authorization took about 2min to process.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I agree worth everyone about the keyboard situation. Very disappointing. Seeking a refund through their dev team from help menu. Will post again...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not what I expected.
reviews.comment: I thought that it was compatible with Microsoft Office 2010 but it\'s not which makes me kinda mad because OfficeSuite Professional 5 is which is what is needed on any mobile office if it compatible with Word. I can open all of my documents in OfficeSuite Professional 5 but I can\'t in DTG!! I would not recommend this app at all until the company makes it compatible with Word 2010.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No Support, will not reply to email.
reviews.comment: Will not allow excel spreadsheets to transfer from A500 to PC Desktop.  Windows states file is corrupted by this program editor.  Reached out for support, no response.  I had high hopes, but ended up wasting $15.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just recently haveing trouble conecting to my pc. Says its not conected. Already updated, but problem still there
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Constant force stop
reviews.comment: (Samsung Galaxy Tab-Verizon version). Every time I try to edit a document, I have had to force stop this app, especially using the word version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I started using Docs to Go yearw ago with  my Palm Tungsten, continued through ownership of BlackBerry,  and have just purchased the full version for Android.  It\'s an essential  tool that I wouldn\'t want to be without.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BEWARE: Does not support Excel Tables
reviews.comment: Just to be clear, version 4 of Docs To Go on the iPad handles tables just fine. Version 3 for Android does not work with Excel tables. Found out the hard way after having had purchased the full version key.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unable to Save using full version
reviews.comment: I am using the Acer A200 tablet and paid for a full version. It allows me to edit the files but program locks when I attempt to save an EXCEL file.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well on a Xoom
reviews.comment: This app has a lot more formatting features as compared to most other office apps in the market. I bought it for my Xoom and it worked really well on it. The synchronization with Google Docs was very easy to setup and the app allowed me to edit documents from my GDocs account right away. I gave it 4-stars instead of 5 only because the interface is designed more for a phone and not as much for a tablet. Hope they add tablet-specific features soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bought it and...
reviews.comment: I purchased the full version a while back, and just updated it. My phone tells me I have the full version.... their ad thanks me for downloading the full version... They give me a \"key\" to install... I do that, and open it... and it starts all over, asking me to update and giving me a key. Uhhh explanation, please??
reviews.author: J\'aime Rukstad

reviews.comment: Possibly one of the best apps for the Android. I no longer miss my Windows-based phone for mobile office apps. Documents to Go takes care of that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unknown Extra Charge
reviews.comment: Google basically charged me an extra dollar in addition to the purchase I\'ve already made for a reason they didn\'t explain, and I want to know Why.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great but....
reviews.comment: Will give 5 stars when it can be used in windows mode. This type of app above all others needs this type of functionality.
reviews.author: James Lecouffe

reviews.title: Excellent Job
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this app a lot both on Ios and on my android.  It works excellently for me.  I make the most use of the excel function including functions moderate functions.
reviews.author: A Google User
